name: Soldier Survival Combat War: Great Battle of Nations In The Trenches
name_original: Soldier Survival Combat War: Great Battle of Nations In The Trenches
description:
Be the super soldier hero you always wanted to be in this military adventure!

Get your blood pumping as you run along and stop the bad guys from taking over.

Test your reflexes by avoiding the obstacles and dangers that come flying at you through the air!

See if you have what it takes to become a hero!

Features:
* Great for Kids or Adults
* Amazing graphics
* Universal app supports iPhone / iPad / iPod Touch
* Addictive Gaming

Download right now!
